page.title: 04TRADE IN IXWORTH
page.content:
50 of the people employed in the local businesses live in Ixworth. ***************************************
Most businesses rely on trade from both inside and outside the village. The electrical shop and the Gunsmith both said that most of their trade came from outside the village.The Gunsmith also undertook postal contracts sometimes from overseas. The publicans from the Greyhound Public House said that they relied on regular customers, most of whom lived in the village. *************************************** Only 2 traders felt that the new by-pass would have a detrimental effect on their business, all the others felt the advantages would outweigh the disadvantages.
